description: From Ancient Greek μισογύνης (misogúnēs), from μισέω (miséō, “I hate”) + γυνή (gunḗ, “woman”).

adjectives.description: misogynist (comparative more misogynist, superlative most misogynist)

entries.meaning: Misogynistic: relating to or exhibiting misogyny.
One who professes misogyny; a hater of women.
examples: "Confound all women, I say!" muttered the young misogynist.

entries.meaning: One who displays prejudice against or looks down upon women.
